Text.Page:
Careful observation of the gorge reveals the demons that directly control the spirits. What a discovery!

According to the scouts, the kariagons hold magical shackles with them. Those shackles need to be examined.

Please retrieve the shackles from the {@LinkCreature:13#6#kariagons} and {@LinkCreature:13#300942#terron thralls}. They mostly appear on the southwest of Tainted Gorge.
Already the roads are safer. Whatever the scions were doing with the enslaved spirits suffers for your success. But more than just this one victory is necessary for our goal.
The shackles are the key. No simple binding should enslave spirits so completely. Kill as many {@LinkCreature:13#6#kariagons} as is necessary to obtain them.
